TopicTitle: Any mod for aerodynamic details in VAB?

Articles.Content:
Hey, I was wondering if there's any mod out there that shows you all the information about your vessel's aerodynamic features in VAB.

Like a mod that indicates if your craft would be unstable in flight, and maybe why and how to fix it? Sure there's the vanilla CoM, CoL and Aerodynamic overlay but it's surely not enough. I have a craft that has perfect alignments of these 3 indicators but is still unstable in flight. Having a mod that shows me detailed info about my vessel's aerodynamics would help a lot.

Thanks in advance and have a great day!
